title: Ping Increase
body: Just wanted to see if anyone else using Frontier Communications has seen an increase in ping. I used to play on 30 ping pretty consistently but now its up to 100 almost the entire game, and the network log checker tells me what I already know.

replies.body: Since you already got logs, you could submit them over to our tech team  in a [ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)so we can look into what's going on and work towards a fix.
